title: Frank AlpenCoin
author: Frank AlpenCoin
created_time: December 10, 2022, 04:40:54 PMLast edit: December 10, 2022, 10:05:44 PM by Frank AlpenCoin
content: 5H Auction for an "Alpen Coin 25 Orange Pillers Roll"The roll contains 25 Orange pillers, each coin is loaded with 10k sats. Serial E125 - 149The box will be sealed with holograms.Total Value: 250'000 Satoshi or 0.0025 BTCThe coins have a diameter of 39 mm and are in ceramic.      STARTING BID: 0.016 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: .001 BTCEND TIME: DECEMBER 10th, 2022, 23:00 GENEVA TIMEPayment due in BTC within 24 hours of auction end. I will send the winner the payment addressSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.SHIPPING: 30 CHF with tracking anywhere in the US and worldwide                  20 CHF with tracking in the EU                   7 CHF with tracking in Switzerland  (this cost could change)Escrow allowed, winner pays fees.Thank you and good luck
